mcq.statement: Which areas have been included in FATA by the 19th Constitution Amendment?

options.a: Tribal Areas Adjoining Lakki Marwat and Tank Districts
options.b: Tribal Areas Adjoining Kohat and Peshawar Districts
options.c: Tribal Areas Adjoining Lakki Marwat and Dera Ismail khan Districts
options.d: Tribal Areas Adjoining Bannu and Tank Districts
